Desc.entry: Small group of volunteers who collect and conserve items of interest from Chapeltown, High Green and surrounding areas. The materials relate to the economic and social history of the area and include photographs, documents, artefacts and taped and written recollections. Maintains a collection of over 3000 photographs of Chapeltown, High Green, Ecclesfield, Grenoside, Thorpe Hesley and Wentworth. Publishes books, mounts exhibitions and holds events in various local venues.
